mapper.insert: insert into t_byuzhi (byuzhiId, byuzhiName, byuzhiMark, byuzhiMark1, byuzhiMark2, byuzhiType, byuzhiType1, byuzhiType2, byuzhiDouble, byuzhiDouble1, byuzhiDouble2, byuyuanId, byuyuanName, byumenId, byumenName ) values (#{byuzhiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byuzhiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byuzhiMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byuzhiMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byuzhiMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byuzhiType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byuzhiType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byuzhiType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byuzhiDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{byuzhiDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{byuzhiDouble2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{byuyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byuyuanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_byuzhi set byuzhiName = #{byuzhiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, byuzhiMark = #{byuzhiMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, byuzhiMark1 = #{byuzhiMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, byuzhiMark2 = #{byuzhiMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, byuzhiType = #{byuzhiType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, byuzhiType1 = #{byuzhiType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, byuzhiType2 = #{byuzhiType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, byuzhiDouble = #{byuzhiDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, byuzhiDouble1 = #{byuzhiDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, byuzhiDouble2 = #{byuzhiDouble2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, byuyuanId = #{byuyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, byuyuanName = #{byuyuanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, byumenId = #{byumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, byumenName = #{byumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where byuzhiId = #{byuzhiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select byuzhiId, byuzhiName, byuzhiMark, byuzhiMark1, byuzhiMark2, byuzhiType, byuzhiType1, byuzhiType2, byuzhiDouble, byuzhiDouble1, byuzhiDouble2, byuyuanId, byuyuanName, byumenId, byumenName from t_byuzhi where byuzhiId = #{byuzhiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
